chain.name: Eliminating Mateon
procedures: Search for Green Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field IV.
Eliminate 100 Mateon.
Return to Green Mesoranger once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Eliminating Plateon and Mecateon
rewards: Adamantium Knuckle x  if you are a Warrior
Blue Arten x  if you are a Magician
Gold Brace x  if you are a Bowman
Gold Cleave x  if you are a Thief
Brown Barbee x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Search for Green Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field IV.
Eliminate 200 Plateon.
Hunt for 150 Mecateon's Laser Gun from Mecateon.
Return to Green Mesoranger and give him the items collected.

chain.name: Eliminating Plateon
procedures: Search for Green Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Boswell Field IV.
Hunt for 80 Plateon's Helmet from Plateon.
Return to Green Mesoranger and give him the items collected.

chain.name: Eliminating Chief Gray
procedures: Search for Black Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Kulan Field I.
Collect 3 Note by hunting Chief Gray.
Return to Black Mesoranger once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Collecting Meteorite Samples             (Level 44 and above)
procedures: Talk to Yellow Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Off-Limits.
Head over to Omega Sector: Kulan Field I and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 1.
Head back to Omega Sector: Kulan Field II and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 4.
Go to Omega Sector: Kulan Field III and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 2.
Search for Hidden Street: Barnard Field and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 5.
Go to Omega Sector: Kulan Field IV and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 3.

Finally, go to Omega Sector: Kulan Field V and obtain 1 Meteorite Sample from Meteorite 6.



Kulan Field I

Kulan Field II



Kulan Field III

Kulan Field IV



Kulan Field V

Barnard Field
Return to Yellow Mesoranger once you have completed the task.

chain.name: The Effort to Make-Up
procedures: Talk to Yellow Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Off-Limits.
Eliminate 120 Ultra Gray.
Return to Yellow Mesoranger  once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Trading with Alien Gray
procedures: Talk to Alien Gray in Omega Sector: Kulan Field II.
Collect 3 Secret Document by hitting the storage units around Omega Sector: Silo.
Return to Alien Gray once you have completed the task.

name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Story of Axes

chain.name: Retrieving the Storybook: The Story of Axes
procedures: Once you have obtained 1 Storybook on The Story Of Axes from The Story of Axes quest, talk to Wiz the Librarian at Ludibrium: Helios Tower <Library>.

itemsNeeded.name: Storybook on The Story Of Axes

chain.name: Judging the Axe
rewards: Steel Axe For Tree Cutters x 1
procedures: Search for God of Mountains at Korean Folk Town: A Small Well and talk to him.
Hunt for 1 Axe from Dark Axe Stump.
Return to God of Mountains after you have obtained the item.
chain.npcLocation: Korean Folk Town: A Small Well

chain.name: The Story of Axes
rewards: Storybook on The Story Of Axes x 1
procedures: Search for God of Mountains at Korean Folk Town: A Small Well and talk to him.
Redo Judging the Axe quest until you obtain 1 Tree Cutter's Steel Axe.
Once you have successfully obtained the item, head over to Korean Folk Town: Tiger Forest II and talk to Tree Cutter.
chain.npcLocation: Korean Folk Town: A Small Well

chain.name: The History of Zeta Leticulan
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Claw for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Black Mesoranger in Omega Sector: Kulan Field I.
Hunt for 1 Barnard Gray's Cell from Barnard Gray.
Hunt for 1 Zeta Gray's Cell from Zeta Gray.
Hunt for 1 Ultra Gray's Cell from Ultra Gray.
Hunt for 1 Chief Gray's Cell from Chief Gray.
Return to Black Mesoranger once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Chief Gray's Sign
procedures: Talk to Gunny in Omega Sector: Boswell Field V.
Hunt for 5 Chief Gray's Sign from Chief Gray.
Return to Gunny and pass him the collected item.

chain.name: The New Control Program             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Kay in Omega Sector: Silo.
Go to Porter in Omega Sector: Command Center and talk to him.

chain.name: Porter the Undependable             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Hunt for 3 Rombot's Memory Card from Rombot.
Head back to Porter in Omega Sector: Command Center and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Porter's Mistake             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Hunt for another 1 Rombot's Memory Card from Rombot.
Head back to Porter in Omega Sector: Command Center and give him the collected item.

chain.name: The Brilliant Assistant             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Lastly, return to Kay and give her the items.

chain.name: Fuel for MT-09
procedures: Talk to Kay in Omega Sector: Silo.
Collect 5 MT-09's Fuel from MT-09.
Return to Kay and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Porter's Challenge
procedures: Talk to Porter in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 200 Blue Toy Block from King Block Golem.
Hunt for 200 Jr. Cerebes Tooth from Jr. Cerebes.
Go back Porter and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Porter's Secret Letter             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Porter in Omega Sector: Command Center and you will obtain 1 Porter's Letter.
Go to Kay in Omega Sector: Silo and pass the item to her.

chain.name: Where is the Dropship?             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Search for Dropship in Hidden Street: Plateon Field.
Click on it and you will obtain 1 Pilot's Letter.

chain.name: The Pilot's Whereabouts...             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Return to Kay and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Queen's New Make-Up Kit
procedures: Talk to Areda in Ariant Castle: King's Room.
Hunt for 20 Sand.
Return to her after you have completed the task.

name: Making the Body and Physics Medicine

chain.name: Making the Body and Physics Medicine 1             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Talk to No Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 10 Snake Leather from Red Flower Serpent or Blue Flower Serpent.
Head over to Mu Lung and talk to Tae Sang.

chain.name: Making the Body and Physics Medicine 2             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang at Mu Lung and you will obtain 1 Body And Physics Medicine.
Head back to Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple and give the obtained item to No Gong.

chain.name: Phyllia's Concern
procedures: Talk to Phyllia in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Orbis: Orbis Park and talk to Ericsson.

chain.name: Ericsson's Ingredients
procedures: Talk to Ericsson at Orbis: Orbis Park.
Hunt for 100 Lunar Pixie's Moonpiece from Lunar Pixie.
Hunt for 10 Fierry's Tentacle from Fierry.
Return to Ericsson and talk to him.

chain.name: A Sip of the Moon
procedures: Talk to Ericsson at Orbis: Orbis Park to obtain Drop of Moon and Ericsson's Letter.
Go back to Sunset Road: Magatia and deliver the obtained items to Phyllia.

chain.name: Keeny's Pal Humanoid A             (Level 45 and above)
rewards: Despite what the in-game text mentions about hunting 100 Piece of Mithril, you really are supposed to hunt for 100 Hardened Piece of Steel. This is a bug that may be fixed in the future.
procedures: Talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for 100 Piece of Steel from Iron Mutae.
Hunt for 100 Hardened Piece of Steel from Reinforced Iron Mutae.
Return to Humanoid A and talk to him.

chain.name: A Present for Keeny
procedures: Talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Keeny and pass Mute's Model to her.

chain.name: Eliminating the Escaped Pot
procedures: Talk to Captain Hwang in Herb Town.
Eliminate 400 Jar.
Return to him after you have completed the given task.

chain.name: No Gong's Teaching             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to No Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Kill 10 Straw Target Dummy.

chain.name: No Gong's Teaching 2             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to No Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Kill 20 Straw Target Dummy.

chain.name: No Gong's Teaching 3             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to No Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Kill 40 Straw Target Dummy.

chain.name: Intruder - The Herb Farm 1             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mr. Ku at Herb Town.
Eliminate 100 Bellflower Root.
Return and talk to him after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Intruder - The Herb Farm 2             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mr. Ku at Herb Town again.
Eliminate 100 Captain.
Eliminate 100 Kru.
Return and talk to him after you have completed the task.

name: Do Gong Searching for the Swallow

chain.name: Do Gong Searching for the Swallow
procedures: Talk to Do Gong at Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Head over to Korean Folk Town and talk to Swallow.

chain.name: Moren's Upset
procedures: 1. Talk to Moren.
2. Then talk to Gordon in El Nath: El Nath Market.
3. Answer his questions correctly.

chain.name: Gordon's Magic Iron
procedures: Talk to Gordon in El Nath: El Nath Market.
Answer his questions correctly.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Yeti Skin from Jr. Yeti.
Return to Gordon and give him the obtained items.

chain.name: In Search of Wing the Fairy
procedures: Talk to Icarus in Kerning City.
Talk to Wing the Fairy in Ellinia.

chain.name: The Ingredients for the Flying Pill
procedures: Talk to Wing the Fairy in Ellinia.
Hunt for 50 Medicine With Weird Vibes from Wraith.
Collect 20 Witch Grass Leaves from the plant shown below.
Return to Wing the Fairy once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Delivering the Flying Pill
procedures: Return to Icarus with the Flying Medicine.

chain.name: Hero's Gladius
procedures: Talk to Manji in Perion.

chain.name: Reawakening the Gladius
procedures: Talk to Chrishrama in Sleepywood.
Hunt for 1 Ancient Scroll from Dark Stone Golem.
Hunt for 1 Flaming Feather.
Collect 1 Star Rock.
Collect 1 Piece of Ice.
Return to Chrishrama once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Hero's Gladius (Continued)
procedures: Talk to Manji in Perion.

name: Luke the Security Man's Wish to Travel (Warrior Only)

chain.name: Luke the Security Man's Wish to Travel (Warrior Only)
procedures: Talk to Luke in Warning Street: Henesys Dungeon Entrance.
Hunt for 3 Taurospear's Horn  from Taurospear.
Hunt for 50 Dragon Skin.
Hunt for 1 Black Feather from Red Drake.
Collect 40 Screw.
Collect 10 Orihalcon Plate.
Return to Luke once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Lionel's Journey
rewards: Scroll for Cape for Magic Def 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Maya in Henesys.
Collect 100 Hector's Tail.
Return to Maya once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Sabitrama's Anti-Aging Medicine
rewards:
Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Red-Hearted Earrings
Black Crystal Ore
Diamond Ore
procedures: Talk to Sabitrama in Sleepywood.
Talk to Shane in Ellinia.
Collect the Ginseng selected by Sabitrama at the top of the Forest of Patience.
Return to Sabitrama once you have completed the necessary tasks.

name: A Spell That Seals Up a Critical Danger

chain.name: A Spell That Seals Up a Critical Danger I
procedures: Talk to the Insignificant Being in Dungeon: Another Entrance.
Hunt for 33 Cold Steam from Cold Eye.
Return to the Insignificant Being once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: A Spell That Seals Up a Critical Danger II
procedures: Talk to the Insignificant Being in Dungeon: Another Entrance.
Hunt for 33 Wild Kargo's Spirit Rock from Wild Kargo.
Hunt for 18 Tauromacis's Spirit Rock from Tauromacis.
Hunt for 18 Taurospear's Spirit Rock from Taurospear.
Return to the Insignificant Being once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Manji and Balrog
procedures: Talk to Manji of Perion.
Then go to Dungeon: Bottom of the Temple and talk to Mu Young.

name: How to Shoo Away the Evil

chain.name: How to Shoo Away the Evil
procedures: Talk to Chrishrama of Sleepywood.
After obtaining 6 Shaman Charm from Chrishrama, you will need to locate a total of 6 Shaman Rock or Shaman Rock [2] and place the Charm on them.
The first Shaman Rock is located at Dungeon: Ant Tunnel III at the marked red star in the following mini map:
The second Shaman Rock is located at Dungeon: Dangerous Steam at the marked red star in the following mini map:
The third Shaman Rock is located at Dungeon: Deep Ant Tunnel II at the marked red star in the following mini map:
The fourth and fifth Shaman Rock [2] are located at Dungeon: The Tunnel That Lost Light I at the marked red stars in the following mini map:
The final Shaman Rock [2] is located at Dungeon: The Tunnel That Lost Light II at the marked red star in the following mini map:
Return to Chrishrama and talk to him.

chain.name: The Owner of the Mysterious Note             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Head over to Dungeon: Ant Tunnel I and locate a Mysterious Piece of Paper. Double click on it.
Take the Mysterious Piece of Paper to Mu Young at Dungeon: Bottom of the Temple and talk to him.

chain.name: Who is the Owner of the Mysterious Note?             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mu Young at Dungeon: Bottom of the Temple.
You will be transported to a different area. Defeat the Jr. Balrog that appears.
Then talk to Tristan's Spirit at Hidden Street: Tristan's Resting Place.

chain.name: Hughes' New Research
procedures: Search for the hole in Orbis: Orbis Tower <B2> that leads to Orbis Tower <Hugh's Laboratory>.
Enter and talk to Hughes the Fuse.
Hunt for 100 Poopa Egg from Poopa.
Hunt for 100 Poison Poopa's Poisonous Spikes from Poison Poopa.
Return to Hughes the Fuse once you have completed the tasks given.

name: Her Secret Craving for Seal Meat

chain.name: Her Secret Craving for Seal Meat
procedures: Talk to Grandma Yeon in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 15 Seal Meat.
Return to Grandma Yeon once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Grako's Request             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Talk to Grako in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Purchase 1 Cider from Doran.
Return to Grako after purchasing the item.

chain.name: Grako's Request 2             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Talk to Grako once again.
Search for Mariwaka in Zipangu: Showa Town and talk to her.

chain.name: Mariwaka's Request             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Search for Popo in Zipangu: Showa Town and speak to him.

chain.name: Mariwaka's Purse             (Level 45 and above)
procedures: Hunt for 1 Mariwaka's Bag from Leader A or Leader B.
Give the collected item back to Mariwaka.

chain.name: Umi Needs Money             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Talk to Umi in Zipangu: Showa Town. Take note that you must pay 5,000,000 mesos before the quest can begin.

chain.name: Lazy Alien Gray             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Head over to Omega Sector: Kulan Field II and search for Alien Gray.

chain.name: The Arrogant Alien Gray             (Level 50 and above)
procedures: Hunt for 400 Space Food from Barnard Gray.
Return to Alien Gray after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Good Luck             (Level 50 and above)
rewards: Dark Scroll for Topwear for STR 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Bottomwear for Jump 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 30% x 1
procedures: Refine 10 Orihalcon Plate.
Bring the items to Umi.

chain.name: Technical Assignment
procedures: Talk to Johnson in Singapore.
Hunt for 2 Headlight from Trucker.
Hunt for 6 Tires from Trucker.
Hunt for 1 Batteries from Trucker.
Talk to Airu in Singapore after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Cleaning Up the Streets
rewards: Onyx Blade x 1 if you are a Warrior
Nocturnal Staff x 1 if you are a Magician
Diamond Arrow for Bow x 1000 if you are a Bowman
Diamond Arrow for Crossbow x 1000 if you are a Bowman
White Identity x 1 if you are a Thief
Mr. Rasfelt x 1 if you are a Pirate
Fury Claw x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Lita Lawless at New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
Eliminate  200 Gryphon .
Eliminate  200 Electrophant .
Return to Lita Lawless after you have completed your task.
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center

chain.name: Cleaning Up the Streets - Continued
procedures: Talk to Lita Lawless in New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
Eliminate 200 Gryphon.
Eliminate 200 Electrophant.
Return to Lita Lawless after your task is completed.
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center

chain.name: Featherweights
procedures: Talk to Icebyrd Slimm in New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
Hunt for 150 Boomer Core from Boomer.
Eliminate 100 Gryphon.
Return to Icebyrd Slimm after your task is completed.
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center

chain.name: Urban Warrior
procedures: Talk to Icebyrd Slimm in New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center.
chain.npcLocation: New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center

chain.name: Finding Jack
procedures: Talk to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.
Look for Jack in Crimsonwood Mountain: Cavern of Pain and talk to him.

chain.name: A Bright and Sunny Day
procedures: Talk to Village Chief Malek in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 2.
Hunt for 50 Coconut Husk from Chlorotrap.
Return to Village Chief Malek and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Too Hot!
procedures: Talk to Village Chief Malek in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 2.
Hunt for 100 Coconut Husk from Chlorotrap.
Return to Village Chief Malek and give him the collected items.

chain.name: I Am Bored!
procedures: Talk to Village Chief Malek in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 2.
Hunt for 100 Rebab from Emo Slime.
Return to Village Chief Malek and give him the collected items.

chain.name: All Taken Away!
procedures: Talk to Village Chief Malek in Malaysia: Muddy Banks 2.
Hunt for 150 Rebab from Emo Slime.
Return to Village Chief Malek and give him the collected items.
